1.content:
You wake up one morning, but in a world different from the one you remember. The craziest part, you seem to be the only one who remembers what life was like before, and everybody else thinks the new reality is normal. What's changed?

Transformation option: You've become a random inanimate object. Despite being unable to move, you can still see, hear, feel, smell, and even taste. You can even still talk, despite not having a mouth, but everyone else seems to believe you've always been in your current form.

Human Toilet option: In your reality, girls always use guys as toilets, and you're expected to serve your family.

Messy Option: Girls are no longer potty trained at all. Instead, girls just relieve themselves wherever they want, with guys being charged with cleaning it up, and cleaning the girl.

Living in the Bathroom: You literally live a large bathroom at an all girls boarding school. Your only job day in and day out is to keep the bathroom clean and help the girls with whatever they need while they're there.

Other Options: Any ideas, please message me before adding.
1.title: Start

11.content: You wake up, and look around. You can't tell where you are, but it's dark. Suddenly, you begin to panic when you realize you can't get up. It was almost like you were paralyzed. Beginning to freak out, you screamed. You must have woke somebody up because the lights came on. You had become...
11.title: Transformation

112.content:
As the light came on, Amy's face looked down on. The only problem was, she was HUGE! You still couldn't move as suddenly, you felt her pick you up. "What's wrong James?"

"I can't move!" you shouted, panicking even more. "And why do you look so big?"

"Well of course you can't move; panties don't move." she explained nonchalantly.

Panties? What! How could you be her panties? You didn't believe it, and just assumed she was lying to you. That was, until suddenly you looked off to the side, and saw her mirror. There, your reflection clearly showed you to be a pair of her pink panties she was holding.

"I can't be your underwear!" you screamed, seemingly shocking her.

"But you've always been my favorite pair of panties. You grow with me, clean yourself, absorb any smells I make." Amy responded. "I know, you just need to sleep with me tonight to calm down."

With that, she dropped you down to her feet. On foot slid inside, then the other. Next thing you know, you were pulled up and found yourself pressed against her private areas. It was like you could taste and smell her little crotch and ass at the same time.

As gross as this was, you stayed silent out of shock and horror. Amy just smiled, thanking she was helping you with whatever was wrong. She then jumped back in bed, and quickly fell back asleep, unaware of your disgusted state.

A few hours dragged on before she awoke to get ready for school, except she's about to make your day worse.
112.title: Amy's panties

info.brief_description: You wake up in a gross alternate universe
info.description:
Characters:
James(You)- A typical 15 year old guy.
Amy- Your 8 year old little sister.
Sally- Your 4 year old little sister, still potty training.
June- Your mother
Jessica- Your girlfriend.
